getSuburbInfo

Overview

This call is used to fetch the different statistics, charts and statuses that are related to the searched suburb.

BSGv3 BSGv2 Show Additional Data Elements
No Yes -

Additional Information

For further reading regarding BSG Elements:

  • Method_getStatisticsForRegion
  • Method_getHouseholdStructure
  • Method_getYearlyMedianPrices
  • Method_getYearlyMedianPrices
  • Method_getMonthlyMedianPrices
  • Method_getCapitalGrowth
  • Method_getSalesByNumberChartURL
  • Method_getSalesByPriceChartURL
  • Method_getMonthlyMedianPricesChartURL
  • Method_getYearlyMedianPricesChartURL
  • Method_getSuburbStatistics

Request

Parameters

Parameter Description Required
op Operation Yes
uid User ID Yes
sid Session ID Yes
suburb Suburb Yes
state State Yes
postcode Postcode Yes
yearFrom Year From Yes
period Period Yes
displayChartUrl Display Chart Url No
displaySuburbStatistics Display Suburb Statistics No

Sample Request { "op": "getSuburbInfo", "uid": "TWISTUSER001", "sid": "2-4eed242594fc464787b8054ddc77de11", "suburb": "Newtown", "state": "NSW", "postcode": "2042", "yearFrom": "2010", "period": "[1,5,10]" }
